pyet.temperature.romanenko¶

pyet.temperature.romanenko(tmean, rh, k=4.5)[source]¶

Evaporation calculated according to [romanenko_1961].

Parameters

  • tmean (pandas.Series, optional) – average day temperature [°C]

  • rh (pandas.Series, optional) – mean daily relative humidity [%]

  • k (float, optional) – calibration coefficient [-]

Returns

Return type

pandas.Series containing the calculated evaporation.

Examples

>>> et_romanenko = romanenko(tmean, rh)

Notes

Based on equation 11 in [xu_2001].

\[ET=4.5(1 + (\frac{T_a}{25})^2 (1 \frac{e_a}{e_s})\]

References

romanenko_1961

Romanenko, V. A. (1961). Computation of the autumn soil moisture using a universal relationship for a large area. Proc. of Ukrainian Hydrometeorological Research Institute, 3, 12-25.
